title: Improve thinking block UX: graceful fade and persistent display (issue #5)

comments.author: XPS15\kroot
comments.text:
Analyzed the current implementation in chat_bot_helper.py. Key issues identified:
1. Line 996: thinking_placeholder.empty() clears display immediately
2. Line 1011: Thinking saved with render=False, so it doesn't appear in history
3. No transition delay or visual feedback when thinking completes

Solution plan documented in scratchpads/issue-5-thinking-block-ux.md

comments.author: XPS15\kroot
comments.text:
Implemented Phase 1 and Phase 2:
1. Added time import
2. Modified thinking stream to show 'Done thinking' indicator with checkmark
3. Added 1.5 second delay for visual continuity before clearing placeholder
4. Changed render=False to render=True so thinking appears in chat history as collapsible expander

title: SQL not displayed after successful retry attempt

comments.author: XPS15\kroot
comments.text: Found the bug in chat_bot_helper.py:977-990. The SQL display logic only shows SQL on first attempt: 'if attempt == 1 and st.session_state.get("show_sql", True)'. When a retry succeeds (attempt > 1), the successful SQL is never displayed. Need to add SQL display after successful retry.
